name: Scripts: Untold Secrets
description:
[Scripts: Untold Secrets] is an interactive story platform with plenty of genres to choose from! These include romance, adventure, horror, LGBTQ+, fantasy, comedy, mystery, and more!

[Platform Features]
※Read, interact and create stories all on one platform.
You can read a plethora of stories ranging from sweet fluff to intense adventures.
Immerse yourself in the stories found on [Scripts: Untold Secrets] and find your soulmate.
Create and share your own stories. You could be the next star writer!

※Exquisite graphics and plenty of themes to immerse you in the unique worlds.

※Experience the stories, interact with characters via choices, and decide your character's fate!

Some of our favorites reads:

Buried Feelings: After graduated from high school, your friends planned a week-long trip to a beach house. In the trip, you have an identity crisis. Will follow your heart and find your soulmate?

Becoming Familiar: You just had an epic win in the court room. You dominated in there, but tonight you want to lose control for a change.

Forbidden Love: As a regular city girl, you're looking for a career to move out of your dad's apartment, until a clothes store assistant changes your life. Will you choose family or love?
